main_definition: Milan is a city in Italy known for its fashion, art, and sports, particularly football.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The name of an Italian city famous for its fashion industry, including luxury brands like Armani and Versace.
meanings_and_examples.example: Milan is considered one of the world's major centers for fashion design.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A term used in football (soccer) to refer to a team from Milan, which has won numerous national championships.
meanings_and_examples.example: AC Milan is one of Italy's most successful football clubs with multiple Serie A titles.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An informal expression for someone who is very skilled or proficient in a particular area, often referencing the high standards associated with Milan.
meanings_and_examples.example: He has a real Milan touch when it comes to designing shoes; every piece he makes is top-notch.
